content: try your hand at creating your own garment with this beginner-friendly crochet dress pattern timelessly designed and given a modern twist with the unique texture of caron colorama lacy this pattern features simple techniques and minimal shaping practice single_crochet double_crochet and double_crochet two together choose your favorite color and shift your style with this stunning dress materials caron® colorama lacy™ 8 oz/227 g 361 yds/330 m sizes xs/s m l berry patch 11009 3 4 4 balls sizes xl 2/3xl 4/5xl berry patch 11009 4 5 6 balls sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
